snippet: Thousands of firefighters attended the funeral of Lieutenant Gordon Matthew Ambelas on Thursday. He was the first city firefighter to die in the line of duty in over two years.
abstract: Funeral for New York City firefighter Lt Gordon Matthew Ambelas is held in Staten Island; Ambelas died in Brooklyn high-rise fire after a 14-year firefighting career, first city firefighter to die in line of duty in over two years.

byline.contributor: Alan Feuer and John Surico contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Thousands of firefighters attended the funeral of Lieutenant Gordon Matthew Ambelas on Thursday. He was the first city firefighter to die in the line of duty in over two years.

headline.main: Final Salute for Firefighter: ‘He Was a Lesson to the Rest of Us’
headline.print_headline: Final Salute for Firefighter: ‘He Was a Lesson to the Rest of Us’
